projects.title: Stocks Mobile Application
projects.description: Stocks app created using React Native and Yahoo finance API

projects.title: Wander Nest
projects.description: This web application provides information on camp grounds around the world. Registered users can create/view/edit/delete/review camp grounds.

projects.title: Stock Ticker
projects.description: This React application displays the stock data graphically by using Alpha Vantage API call. It is hosted on Firebase.

projects.title: Toronto Church On The Rock Ministries
projects.description: This is a live website created for a church in Toronto. I have used Verse of the day API to display a new verse daily.

projects.title: Arcade Game
projects.description: This project is a fun game to cross a river while being attacked by giant bugs. Additional points are gained on collecting precious jewels on the way.

projects.title: Memory Matching Game
projects.description: This project is another fun game to match the same tiles by memorizing their position.

projects.title: RGB Color Matching Game
projects.description: Match the given RGB color value with given set of colors.
